mosaicMethodDescription.none: Use the order of the images in the attribute table
mosaicMethodDescription.attribute: Order images based on a field from the attribute table
mosaicMethodDescription.center: Order images with center points closest to the screen center on top
mosaicMethodDescription.nadir: Order images with nadir positions closest to the screen center on top
mosaicMethodDescription.northwest: Order images with center points closest to the northwest corner of the boundary on top
mosaicMethodDescription.seamline: Smooth transitions between images with the predefined seamlines
mosaicMethodDescription.lock-raster: Select specific images to display using ObjectID
mosaicMethodDescription.viewpoint: Order images with nadir points closest to the predefined viewpoint on top

mosaicOperatorDescription.first: Display with higher ranked images on top of lower ranked images
mosaicOperatorDescription.last: Display with lower ranked images on top of higher ranked images
mosaicOperatorDescription.min: Display the minimum value of overlapping pixels
mosaicOperatorDescription.max: Display the maximum value of overlapping pixels
mosaicOperatorDescription.mean: Display the mean value of overlapping pixels
mosaicOperatorDescription.blend: Display the weighted-mean value of overlapping pixels
mosaicOperatorDescription.sum: Display the sum value of overlapping pixels
